item.title: Hello, World!
item.description: Welcome to the #VisualGreenTech site! This is an initiative kickstarted in April 2021 with 24 prompts to help community awareness and action around sustainable living and sustainable engineering practices, leading up to #EarthDay. Here are the prompts:
